review_blob:
Great earthy hoppy smell
Nice reddish brown color with great lacing
Delicious hoppy flavor with nice balance in the bitterness 
Lasting, somewhat thick hop mouthfeel
Overall very good pale ale, but not incredibly holiday-ish

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Incredibly aromatic hoppy smell along with a good amount of citrus notes
Beautiful foggy gold color
Tastes absolutely incredible with very strong hop notes and a little grapefruit, but not overly bitter
Palate is perfect.  Lasting flavors and thick
Best Imperial IPA that I've ever had.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Nice Christmas gingerbread kind of nose.
Deep color.  Reddish
Sweet and crisp taste for a winter warmer.  Nice balance of bitterness
Palate is dull.  No real lasting flavors stick around and leaves just the bitterness

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
